name: Ghostel: Haunted Halls
description:
Ghostel : Haunted Halls is a spooky themed 2D survival game. You have to run through this haunted hotel and survive as long as you can!

This game was made for Weekly Game Jam 87, with the theme 'Inifinite Hallway'.

                                                                               

Credits to:

Programmer and Game Designer:

UnknownSurvivor

Artists:

Deborah "TallDeborah" Low

Ash "LashGhost" Michalak

Music and SFX:

Epajer55
